title: Sub Question 1
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

1 point: Sororem = Anna; Dido’s sister
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

1 point: Sororem = Anna; Dido’s sister

Student response earns one of the available points.

1 point: Sororem = Anna; Dido’s sister

title: Sub Question 2
stimulusHtml:
3 points maximum

3 points: 2nd person pluperfect subjunctive; (optative is acceptable)
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

3 points: 2nd person pluperfect subjunctive; (optative is acceptable)

Student response earns one of the available points.

3 points: 2nd person pluperfect subjunctive; (optative is acceptable)

Student response earns two of the available points.

3 points: 2nd person pluperfect subjunctive; (optative is acceptable)

Student response earns three of the available points.

3 points: 2nd person pluperfect subjunctive; (optative is acceptable)

title: Sub Question 3
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

1 point: That they could have died together; that they had died by the same sword; that Dido had called Anna to die with her; that they had suffered the same fate; needs to indicate Anna’s desire to share death, etc., with Dido; e.g., may say "together" or "too."
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

1 point: That they could have died together; that they had died by the same sword; that Dido had called Anna to die with her; that they had suffered the same fate; needs to indicate Anna’s desire to share death, etc., with Dido; e.g., may say "together" or "too."

Student response earns one of the available points.

1 point: That they could have died together; that they had died by the same sword; that Dido had called Anna to die with her; that they had suffered the same fate; needs to indicate Anna’s desire to share death, etc., with Dido; e.g., may say "together" or "too."
